meanings: come out to meet sb in person[personally]

meanings.meaning: hail the rising of the sun

vlive.korean: 마중 나오실 거예요? Are you going to come pick me up? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 쫑알쫑알 해도 돼요?🦋
vlive.english: Are you going to come pick me up?

vlive.korean: 내가 마중을 가야 돼? 내 케이크를 가지러? Do I need to go out? To get my own cake? 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] 엉망진창 아이유 11주년 파티
vlive.english: Do I need to go out? To get my own cake?

vlive.korean: 여러분들 많이 공항에 또 마중 나와주시고 또... Many of you came to greet me at the airport. 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : 캐나다 콘서트 마치고 한국도착^^
vlive.english: Many of you came to greet me at the airport.

vlive.korean: 마중 가줄게 - 정말? I will walk you to the door. - Really? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BLACKPINK] 굿나잇굿나잇 젠츄즈 굿나잇굿나잇 잘자요🎶(Jisoo and Jennie’s hotel V)
vlive.english: I will walk you to the door. - Really?

vlive.korean: 내가 마중 가줄게 - 정말? I will walk you to the door. - Really? 듣기 View video BLACKPINK : 츄의 심야방송💖
vlive.english: I will walk you to the door. - Really?

examples.korean: Will you meet me at the airport? 발음듣기 공항에 날 마중 나올 거니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Will you meet me at the airport? 발음

examples.korean: I met him off the plane. 발음듣기 나는 그를 공항까지 마중 나갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I met him off the plane. 발음

examples.korean: The hotel bus meets all incoming flights. 발음듣기 호텔 버스가 모든 입국 항공편에 맞춰 마중을 나간다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The hotel bus meets all incoming flights. 발음

examples.korean: Jean is going to meet me at the other end. 발음듣기 (여정의) 저쪽 편에 가면 진이 나를 마중 나오기로 되어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Jean is going to meet me at the other end. 발음

examples.korean: He was met by his brother on his return from Italy. 발음듣기 그는 이탈리아에서 돌아왔을 때 형[남동생]의 마중을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was met by his brother on his return from Italy. 발음
